view.elements

Class GraphicCanvasView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • view.elements.GraphicCanvasView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GObserver, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class GraphicCanvasView
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements GObserver
    View representing the canvas on which graphic shapes can be drawn, and also overlays needed for editing grapphic elements.
    Author:
    geomaster
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
